recipe: Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box. Add blueberries and syrup to taste.
Follow instructions on waffle mix. Add blueberries and syrup to taste. Enjoy!
Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box. Add chocolate chips and syrup to taste.
Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box. Add 1 Tbsp cinnamon and 1 tsp vanilla per 1 cup of mix used. Add syrup to taste.
Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box for pancakes. Slice up fresh strawberries, or heat up frozen strawberries, then place them on pancakes as topping.

meal_name: vegan pancakes with strawberries and nutella
recipe: Follow instructions on pancake mix for pancakes. Spread nutella on pancakes. Slice up fresh strawberries, or heat up frozen strawberries, then place them on pancakes as topping.

Cook sausages as large patties. Cook eggs over medium, breaking and spreading the yolk during cooking. While egg is cooking, slice and toast onion bagel. Place 1 slice cheddar cheese on onion bagel. Place cooked egg onto cheese, then sausage on top of egg. Enjoy!

Cook ground breakfast sausage.

Cook shredded hash browns in oil.

Slice up bell pepper and onion. Heat a drizzle of oil in a pan on medium high heat. Add sliced pepper and onion and cook until softened.

With the pepper and onion still in the pan, add 4 eggs and scramble while cooking, incorporating with the vegatables. When the eggs are almost done, add breakfast sausage.

Heat up tortilla in microwave for 15 seconds. Add egg mixture, shredded cheese, and hash browns into tortilla.

Wrap up and secure with toothpicks. Enjoy!
Add milk to rolled oats in a bowl until just covered. Cook in microwave for 2 minutes, or until milk is dissolved. Add fresh fruit and cream. Enjoy!
Slice croissant and heat for 2 minutes on low broil. Spread nutella on croissant. Enjoy!

meal_name: bacon, hash browns, fruit, and eggs

recipe:
Serves 2.

1. Cook ground beef in pan, drain fat, and then mix in taco seasoning and water, following instructions on the taco seasoning packet. Transfer cooked taco meat to a bowl 

2. Dice avocado, jalapeno, and roma tomatoes. 

3. Heat additional olive oil in the same pan where you cooked the beef. Place 6 corn tortillas (this can be done in 2 sets as needed). 

4. Spread chipotle mayo, cheese, beef, jalapenos, avocado, and tomatoes on quesadillas. Place another corn tortilla on top. Flip after about 3 minutes, or once down side is crispy. 

5. Optionally serve with greek yogurt as a sour cream replacement. Enjoy!

Serves 2.

Heat oil in a pan. Place 6 corn tortillas (can do 2 sets of 3 as needed). Spread with cheese, avocado, tomato, and jalapeno. Place another corn tortilla on top. Flip after about 3 minutes, or when the bottom side is crispy and browned. Enjoy!

Serves 2. 

Medium boil 2 eggs. Slice lettuce, cucumber, and grape tomatoes. Mix together lettuce, cucumber, tomato, banana peppers, and dressing to taste. Slice egg into slices. Top each salad with feta cheese and 1 sliced egg. Enjoy!

Serves 2. 

Slice lettuce, cucumber, and grape tomatoes. Mix together lettuce, cucumber, tomato, banana peppers, and dressing to taste. Top each salad with feta cheese. Enjoy!

1. Cook the pasta. 2. Slice all the vegetables into bite size pieces (halve the grape tomatoes). Cut the pepperonis into strips and the mozzarella into 1cm cubes. 3. Mix vegetables, cheese, pepperoni, and pasta. Add italian dressing when serving. Enjoy!

1. Cook the pasta. 2. Slice all the vegetables into bite size pieces (halve the grape tomatoes). Cut the mozzarella into 1cm cubes. 3. Mix vegetables, cheese, and pasta. Add italian dressing when serving. Enjoy!

Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Spread olive oil on the bottom of each pita and place on a metal pan.

Add pizza sauce and mozzarella cheese on top of each pita, to taste. Thiny slice tomato and add about 3 slices per pizza. Add fresh basil leaves between tomatoes to taste. 

Make a mixture of olive oil, minced minced garlic, and rosemary. Drizzle over pizza.

Bake for 10-12 minutes, until browned and crispy on bottom of pita. Optionally top with a drizzle of balsmic reduction and eat. Enjoy!

Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Spread olive oil on the bottom of each pita and place on a metal pan.

Add pizza sauce and mozzarella cheese on top of each pita, to taste. Thiny slice tomato and add about 3 slices per pizza. Add fresh basil leaves between tomatoes to taste. 

Make a mixture of olive oil, minced minced garlic, and rosemary. Drizzle over pizza.

Bake for 10-12 minutes, until browned and crispy on bottom of pita. Optionally top with a drizzle of balsmic reduction and eat. Enjoy!
Mix all ingredients in blender. Add additional milk as needed until it has a frozen but smooth consistency. Enjoy!
Mix all ingredients in blender. Add additional milk alternative as needed until it has a frozen but smooth consistency. Enjoy!

meal_name: Morning star chicken nuggets with Honey Mustard and Carrots

recipe: Spread cream cheese on bagel. Place smoked salmon slices and sliced green onions on top. Enjoy!

meal_name: premade broccoli cheddar soup and sourdough bread
recipe: Heat up broccoli cheddar soup in a pan. Bake sourdough bread in oven. Dip bread in soup. Enjoy!

meal_name: Garlic Tomato Bagel with Cream Cheese
recipe: 1. Heat olive oil in a pan on medium high heat. Put grape tomatoes in pan with oil and saute for 5 minutes, until softened and lightly charred. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute more. Toast bagel and spread both side with cream cheese. Place roasted garlic tomatoes and remaining olive oil from pan on top of the bagel. Enjoy!

meal_name: Bagel with Salami, Ham, and Sliced Cucumber

recipe:
Turn oven on to a low broil. Place ham, salami, and provolone cheese onto an open sub bun. Bake on a low broil for 2 minutes, until cheese is melted. 

Add banana peppers, cucumber slices, lettuce, and a drizzle of italian dressing. Enjoy!

1. Toss the cubed chicken breasts in flour that has been generously seasoned with salt and pepper, until all pieces are lightly coated.

2. With the cooker's lid off, heat oil on HIGH or brown, until sizzling. 

3. Place the ocated chicken in the cooker and saute until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.

4. Add the onion, carrots, bell pepper, and jalapeno pepper, and stir well, sauteing 1 additional minute. 5. Add the chicken stock, cilantro, cumin, salt, and pepper to the chicken mixture. Securely lock the pressure cooker's lid and set for 7 minutes on HIGH. 

6. Perform a quick release to release the cooker's pressure. Stir in corn kernels and tortilla strips before serving.

1. With your slow cooker's lid off, heat button on HIGH or brown, until melted and sizzling. 

2. Place onion in cooker and saute until translucent, 4-5 minutes. 

3. Add broccoli florets, caroots, chicken stock, garlic powder, and onion powder. Securely lock the pressure cooker's lid and set for 4 minutes on HIGH.

4. Perform a quick release to release the cooker's pressure. 

5. Stir in heavy cream and Cheddar cheese, and then add salt and pepper to taste before serving.

meal_name: grilled cheese with tomato basil soup
recipe: Heat up your favorite brand of canned tomato basil soup. Make a grilled cheese. Enjoy!

Cook rice by following instructions on bag. Cook frozen chicken tenders in the air fryer at 400 for 10 minutes (or follow instructions on bag, if available). Steam frozen mixed vegetables in microwave. Top with your favorite stir fry sauce.

Prepare rice. Prepare the batter at https://www.spendwithpennies.com/crispy-fried-dill-pickles/, leaving out the dill. 

Slice up cauliflower into bite sized pieces, and cover in batter, then panko bread crumbs. 

Place in air fryer at 400 degrees for 8 minutes, or until outside is golden brown and crispy.

Remove from air fryer and place in a container with a lid. Put your favorite stir fry sauce in the container and shake cauliflower and stir fry sauce together gently, until cauliflower is covered. 

Heat up mixed vegetables in the microwave. Serve vegetables and coated cauliflower over rice. Enjoy!

Preheat open to 450 degrees F. Slice bagel in half, and spread a drizzle of pizza sauce on each side. Put mozzarella cheese and pepperonis on top of pizza sauce. Bake for 5 minutes at 450 degrees F. Enjoy!

Prepare noodles. Shred and cook ground beef in a pan on medium high heat. Drain the fat, and add spaghetti sauce to pan with beef. Cook on a low simmer for a few minutes, then serve meat sauce over noodles. Add parmesan to taste.

meal_name: Date Night Burgers and hash browns
recipe:
1. Heat a generous amount of oil in a pan on high heat. Place shredded hash browns in the oil and cook until golden brown, about 10 minutes. 2. Form ground chuck into burger shapes, season with salt and pepper to taste, and place on a pan on medium heat. Cook to taste, about 4-5 minutes per side recommended.

3. Slice up poblano peppers into long strips. Heat a drizzle of oil on medium high heat in a pan, and add the pepper slices. Cook until slightly charred, about 5 minutes.

4. De-seed dates and add into blender with 2 Tbsp water. Blend, and continue to add water 1 tsp at a time and blend until a thick but spreadable paste is formed. 
. 5. Toast burger buns. Once toasted, spread about 1.5 Tbsp Date Spread and 3 Tbsp goat cheese on each bun. Place 4-5 poblano slices on top of the goat cheese on each. Place burger on bun. Server with hash browns and enjoy!

meal_name: Brown sugar bourbon apple pork chops
Yellow Coconut Curry with Chickpeas and rice
recipe: Prepare rice. Heat a drizzle of oil in a pan on medium high heat. Drain a can of chickpeas, and add to pain with oil, cooking until lightly browned (about 3-5 minutes). Add a can of Lai's Thai coconut curry, found here: https://www.yaisthai.com/products/thai-coconut-curry-yellow to the same pan, and simmar for a few minutes. Serve chickpea curry over rice. Enjoy!

meal_name: Sweet Corn and Poblano Chowder with Old Bay Toast
Honey Miso Broccoli and Sweet Potato Donburi
Pork Sausage and Bell Pepper Risotto
Sweet, Sticky, and Spicy Chicken stir fry

recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly grease a medium baking sheet.

2. Pour egg into a small shallow bowl. Place bread crumbs in a separate shallow bowl. Butterfly chicken breasts, then dip chicken into egg, then into the bread crumbs. Place coated chicken on the prepared baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until not longer pink and juices run clear.

3. Prepare pasta of your choice.

4.. Pour .5 of the spaghetti sauce into a 7 x 11 inch baking dish. Place chicken over sauce, and cover with remaining sauce. Sprinkle mozzarella and parmesan cheeses on top and return to the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Serve over pasta and enjoy!

meal_name: Nutmeg and Thyme Chicken Thighs with Carrots and Potatoes
